cast.name: 查尔斯·巴克利 Charles Barkley
魔术师约翰逊 Magic Johnson
埃里克·拉萨尔 Eriq La Salle

introduction: Actors: Michael Jordan, Jay Thomas, See moreFormat: Color, NTSCLanguage: EnglishRegion: Region 1 (U.S. and Canada only. Read more about DVD formats.)Aspect Ratio: 1.33:1Number of discs: 2DVD Features:Available Audio Tracks: English (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo)Two-DVD set featuring remastered versions of Above & Beyond, Air Time, Come Fly with Me, Michael Jordan's Playground, and His AirnessBonus footage: Jordan's 10 greatest moves, dunks, clutch shots, and assists"It's Gotta Be the Shoes": exclusive Nike feature with popular Jordan/Nike commercials, outtakes, and behind-the-scenes footageGreat Michael Memories: interviews and testimonials from Jordan's NBA peersMichael's Great 8 (highlights from great games): 69 Points (3-28-1990 vs. Cleveland), The Arrival (4-20-86 vs. Boston), 3 Is the Magic Number (1992 NBA Finals vs. Portland), Michael's Last Dance (1998 NBA Finals vs. Utah), The Return (1995 vs. New York), The Flu Game (1997 NBA Finals vs. Utah), The Showdown (1993 NBA Finals vs. Phoenix), The Shot (1989 playoffs vs. Cleveland)Slam-dunk contest highlightsBehind-the-scenes locker room footageInteractive Jordan career timelineJill Scott music tributeDVD-ROM features: A comprehensive statistical overview of Jordan's spectacular career; Upper Deck trading card gallery; EA Sports game sampler; trivia game; photo gallery; Jordan Internet linksCollectible 16-page booklet with never-before-seen photography, Jordan biography and commentary
